title: DSA Level 4 â€” Stacks & Queues
intro: This level covers stack and queue data structures and their use-cases.
points: Understand the LIFO (Last In First Out) principle of stacks.
Perform push and pop operations on stacks conceptually and in code.
Understand the FIFO (First In First Out) principle of queues.
Perform enqueue and dequeue operations using arrays or lists.
Recognize real-life and coding problems where stacks and queues are useful.
